name: Beginner-friendly Notion Template
description: Forget about productivity buzzwords like PARA and CODE. 99% of us literally just need a systematic way to track our tasks and keep our notes organized.WHAT YOU GET A streamlined dashboard to centralize your tasks and notes. Two easy-to-use databases that make everything work. A system designed for real-world needs, not complex theories. Check out my full Notion course: Build Your Command Center in Notion.
features: A streamlined dashboard to centralize your tasks and notes.; Two easy-to-use databases that make everything work.; A system designed for real-world needs, not complex theories.
